scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of people on a grassy hill, looking towards a chariot drawn by two figures in armor, one holding a sword aloft. In the background, a city with various buildings and towers is visible. On the left, a bearded man with raised hands gestures towards the chariot, accompanied by another figure. On the right, a man points towards the chariot, with two other figures beside him, one wearing a hooded garment. The overall impression is one of awe or wonder at a celestial or powerful procession.
